dialogue: Would you mind filling out this customer survey so we know how we're doing?
I don't have time to fill out surveys about everything I do.
But you're making me feel guilty about not doing it.
Oh no! You turned a good customer experience into something ugly.
It's getting all awkward and I'm looking like a big jerk in front of my date.
Now I can never again eat here because I'm afraid of what you'll do to my food.
You've ruined my favorite restaurant, as well as my chance of romance with this woman.
